title: ‘He Has a Real Racing Aura’: Why Josh Tarling Could Be British Cycling’s Next Big Thing
content:
Tarling has already beaten Pogačar, Evenepoel, Van Aert in TTs. Can he break through at the classics? 'Roubaix is the one that suits me best.'

Read the full article at ‘He Has a Real Racing Aura’: Why Josh Tarling Could Be British Cycling’s Next Big Thing on Velo.
author: sstokes
